info.name: CampaignHub API
info.description:
Complete API collection for CampaignHub - A campaign management system with authentication, contacts, and campaigns management.

## Authentication
Most endpoints require JWT Bearer token authentication. Use the Login or Register endpoint first to get a token, then set it in the collection variable `authToken`.

## Base URL
Live: `https://campaignhub1.onrender.com/api`

item.name: Authentication

request.description:
Register a new user account.

**Validation Rules:**
- `email`: Required, must be valid email format
- `password`: Required, minimum 6 characters
- `firstName`: Required, non-empty
- `lastName`: Required, non-empty

**Note:** The JWT token is automatically saved to the `authToken` collection variable on successful registration.

Login with existing user credentials.

**Validation Rules:**
- `email`: Required, must be valid email format
- `password`: Required, non-empty

**Note:** The JWT token is automatically saved to the `authToken` collection variable on successful login.

Get the currently authenticated user's profile information.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer token)

item.description: Authentication endpoints for user registration, login, and profile management.

item.name: Contacts

request.description:
Retrieve all contacts for the authenticated user.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer token)

Retrieve a specific contact by ID.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer token)

**Path Parameters:**
- `id`: Contact ID

Create a new contact.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer token)

**Validation Rules:**
- `firstName`: Required, non-empty
- `lastName`: Required, non-empty
- `email`: Required, valid email format
- `phone`: Optional
- `company`: Optional
- `notes`: Optional

Update an existing contact.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer token)

**Path Parameters:**
- `id`: Contact ID

**Note:** All fields are optional - only include fields you want to update.

Delete a contact by ID.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer token)

**Path Parameters:**
- `id`: Contact ID

item.description: Contact management endpoints for CRUD operations on contacts.

item.name: Campaigns

request.description:
Retrieve all campaigns for the authenticated user.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer token)

Retrieve a specific campaign by ID, including assigned contacts.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer token)

**Path Parameters:**
- `id`: Campaign ID

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Spring Sale 2026",
    "subject": "Don't miss our spring sale!",
    "message": "Get up to 50% off on selected items. Limited time offer!",
    "status": "draft",
    "scheduledAt": "2026-02-15T10:00:00Z"
}

request.description:
Create a new campaign.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer token)

**Validation Rules:**
- `name`: Required, non-empty
- `subject`: Required, non-empty
- `message`: Required, non-empty
- `status`: Optional (defaults to 'draft')
- `scheduledAt`: Optional (ISO 8601 format)

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Spring Sale 2026 - Updated",
    "subject": "Updated: Don't miss our spring sale!",
    "message": "Updated message content here.",
    "status": "sent",
    "scheduledAt": "2026-02-20T10:00:00Z"
}

request.description:
Update an existing campaign.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer token)

**Path Parameters:**
- `id`: Campaign ID

**Note:** All fields are optional. When `status` is set to 'sent', the `sentAt` timestamp is automatically set.

Delete a campaign by ID.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer token)

**Path Parameters:**
- `id`: Campaign ID

Get all contacts assigned to a specific campaign.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer token)

**Path Parameters:**
- `id`: Campaign ID

Add multiple contacts to a campaign.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer token)

**Path Parameters:**
- `id`: Campaign ID

**Validation Rules:**
- `contactIds`: Required, must be non-empty array of contact IDs

**Note:** Duplicate contact assignments are ignored.

Remove a specific contact from a campaign.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer token)

**Path Parameters:**
- `id`: Campaign ID
- `contactId`: Contact ID to remove
